column1: '''P책l-Kristian Engstad''' is a Norwegian game designer. He translated the Text-Adventure ''[[Ringen]]'' into English and converted it into ''MUD-software''<ref name="Tolkien Games-Genesis">[http://www.lysator.liu.se/tolkien-games/entry/genesis.html Genesis] at Tolkien Games (retrieved 3 December 2010)</ref><ref name="Tolkien Games-Viking">[http://www.lysator.liu.se/tolkien-games/entry/viking.html VikingMUD] at Tolkien Games (retrieved 5 January 2011)</ref> (''[[Genesis]]''<ref name="Tolkien Games-Genesis"/> and ''[[VikingMUD]]'').<ref name="Tolkien Games-Viking"/> In the MUD Genesis he expanded the map with more regions from [[Middle-earth]].
